unnormalised: Hey guys, amazing insights on training regimens! Reminds me of when Dr. Sharma pushed us hard at SAI, Patiala. Remember those 400m repeats? Felt like forever! My grandfather, a retired Havildar, always says consistency is key, like praying to Hanumanji everyday. My friend Rahul is building a gym – impressive 2000 sq ft. Project. He's spending Rs. 5 lakhs on it. Even better than the one near Marina Beach, IMHO! What are your thoughts on pre-workout supplements?
normalised: Hey guys, amazing insights on training regimens! Reminds me of when Doctor Sharma pushed us hard at S A I, Patiala. Remember those four hundred meter repeats? Felt like forever! My grandfather, a retired Havildar, always says consistency is key, like praying to Hanumanji everyday. My friend Rahul is building a gym – impressive two thousand square feet. Project. He's spending rupee five lakhs on it. Even better than the one near Marina Beach, in my humble opinion! What are your thoughts on pre-workout supplements?
